author_ssm: Yingwen Huang, under supervision of John Zarrillo
unittitle_ssm: Pastor George R. Swartz Sr. marriage records
abstract_ssm: The records consist of booklets that document marriages conducted by Pastor George R. Swartz Sr. in Brooklyn, dating from 1903-1938. Swartz was the pastor of the Reformed Episcopal Grace Church (Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn) from 1903-1913 and of St. Paul's Lutheran Church (Coney Island neighborhood of Brooklyn) from 1929-1957. The marriage booklets contain detailed information about the brides and grooms and document the marriages Pastor Swartz officiated.
